member.name: F:Bolt.VariableKind.Flow
member.summary: Temporary variables local to the execution flow.

member.name: F:Bolt.VariableKind.Graph
member.summary: Variables local to the current graph.

member.name: F:Bolt.VariableKind.Object
member.summary: Variables shared across the current game object.

member.name: F:Bolt.VariableKind.Scene
member.summary: Variables shared across the current scene.

member.name: F:Bolt.VariableKind.Application
member.summary: Variables shared across scenes. These will be reset when the application quits.

member.name: F:Bolt.VariableKind.Saved
member.summary: Variables that persist even after the application quits. Unity object references are not supported.

member.name: T:Bolt.VariablesSaver
member.summary: Listens to the OnApplicationQuit on OnApplicationPause hooks to trigger the serialization of saved variables into PlayerPrefs.
